item.title: Age generator (just started coding)
item.dc:creator: @theowned theowned
item.description:
@theowned wrote:

i made an ae generator
you need to type in your age
and then you see what you do on your age
i just added it to 13
any suggestions to add an age and tell me what to say in it just reply

the code:

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Helloworld
{
public static void main( String[] args ){
Scanner bucky = new Scanner (System.in);
int age;
System.out.println(“what is your age?”);
age = bucky.nextInt();
switch (age) {
case 1:
System.out.println(“you can crawl”);
break;
case 2:
System.out.println(“you can talk”);
break;
case 3:
System.out.println(“you can crawl”);
break;
case 4:
System.out.println(“you are going to school”);
break;
case 5:
System.out.println(“you can talk much better”);
break;
case 6:
System.out.println(“you can write a little bit”);
break;
case 7:
System.out.println(“you become bigger”);
break;
case 8:
System.out.println(“you are growing”);
break;
case 9:
System.out.println(“almost a teenager”);
break;
case 10:
System.out.println(“a teener”);
break;
case 11:
System.out.println(“you have learned alot of things”);
break;
case 12:
System.out.println(“this year sucks”);
break;
case 13:
System.out.println(“i dont know what i should add here”);
break;
default:
System.out.println(“your age has not been added”);

	}
}

}
